title: Giro d’Italia Underdog Alert: Bardet, Thomas, and Dark Horses Lurking to Surprise Pogačar
content:
Analysis: A relatively thin GC start list could tempt Pogačar and Co. to drop their guard, and that would be a mistake UAE cannot afford.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Underdog Alert: Bardet, Thomas, and Dark Horses Lurking to Surprise Pogačar on Velo.
author: ahood
